Summer (Assume Phase 2)
-Each get two weeks vacation. Max dependant.
Robert sobriety plan
- Christine should not bear the cost of tests. Not my issue. Can pay for tests once past the 2 years, if requested and clean.
- Failed test, back to testing for remainder of time Adrian subject to parenting plan. No over nights, day visits, until sobriety plan is approved.

I sent mine. I was hoping that we would mark up the doc. This way may be a challenge. Hope we can work together on this.
